description: Stores the history of changes to the abstract status.

columns.name: HSP_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID with related abstracting status history information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Each coding history will have its own line number.

columns.name: ABSTS_HX_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The abstract status category ID.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Started


In Progress


Waiting


Completed


Ready To Start


On Hold

columns.name: ABSTS_HX_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the abstracting status changed instant in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Data will not exist in this column for abstracting statuses created before UTC instant tracking was enabled for abstracting history.

columns.name: ABSTS_HX_ASGN_USER_ID
columns.description: Item to store abstracting assigned user changes
